processes.title: Project-Based Learning Workflow
processes.description: A practical approach to learning through building meaningful projects, with emphasis on documentation and knowledge sharing
steps: Start a project that is interesting
Identify a goal
Find what is interesting to accomplish and learn in the project
Break down the project to individual parts
Research how others have solved the problem
Start and create a foundation that is scalable
Document as you go
Share and gain feedback

Learning Optimization: Apply existing knowledege and skills to the current learning
Knowledge Sharing: Knowledge is free and should be shared

processes.title: Deciding What to Work On Next
processes.description: A systematic approach to evaluating new projects and opportunities
steps: Identify the impact of how many people benefit from a project along with how does it align with our goals. (high / low)
Gauge the level of effort and how long it'll take. (high / low)
With our primary goals, in mind, along with how much time we have, select a project that is appropriate
Projects that have a low impact and high level of effort are not something to do now.
Document reasoning and future projects in Typora

Diagrams: Create a 2 column, 2 row chart with the X and Y being impact & level of effort

processes.title: Relationship Management
processes.description: A thoughtful approach to maintaining meaningful connections
steps: Keep meetings and notes organized in Typora
Identify important parts that stood out
Send a thoughtful email
If desired, send food via Gold Belly

processes.title: Change Management
processes.description: A process to gain buy-in and implement large scale projects
steps: Receive a full org structure with all functions
Engage and research all levels of work and interaction
Be curious and ask questions
Document an entire wishlist on Google Sheets for each job function
Have each stakeholder prioritize what they would like (including what they don't want)
compromise and communicate what is in progress

Best Practices: Engage and stay curious to what others do
Do not move forward unless there is agreement
If there is no agreement, compromise till there is
Comunication: Interact with as many people as possible.
collaborate with all levels of people and work tiers

processes.title: Daily Task & Schedule Management
processes.description: A streamlined system for managing daily tasks, meetings, and communications
steps: Schedule meetings, events, and timed reminders in Google Calendar
Manage daily and weekly tasks in Google Keep
Capture quick thoughts in Google Keep
